wc module¶

@author:Zizhou Lu @file: wcfinal.py @time: 16/01/2020 17:41 @file_desc: word count application

For example: input “wc -w test1” in terminal

outputs the word count of the test1 file

# print the help message Returns:

wc.WCversion()¶
wc.mini_wc(is_l, is_w, is_c, is_m, is_L, files)¶

# How to count line, word, char, max_length, Longest line :param is_l: line flag :param is_w: word flag :param is_c: char flag :param is_m: max_length flag :param is_L: Longest line flag :param files:

Returns:

wc.print_wc(is_l, is_w, is_c, is_m, is_L, line, word, byte, char, max_length, file_name)¶

# define how to print wc

Parameters

  • is_l – line count flag

  • is_w – word count flag

  • is_c – char count flad

  • is_m – max_length flag

  • is_L – Longest line count flag

  • line – line count

  • word – word count

  • byte – byte count

  • char – char count

  • max_length – max_length count

  • file_name – the file name

Returns

Result and file name
